pages.disclaimers: SneakerSpot Disclaimers - Understand Terms of Use for Stylish Sneakers SneakerSpot HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Disclaimers SneakerSpot endeavors to present the most accurate and up-to-date information on sneakers and related products. However, the following disclaimers apply: Content Accuracy: While we strive for meticulous accuracy, SneakerSpot does not warrant the infallibility of the information provided. Pricing, release dates, and product specifications are subject to change by manufacturers or retailers at any time. We recommend consulting official sources for the most current information. Product Availability: SneakerSpot does not guarantee the availability of any products listed on our website. Limited-edition releases and high-demand items may sell out quickly. External Links: SneakerSpot may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review their disclaimers and privacy policies before interacting with them. Investment Advice: The information on SneakerSpot is intended for informational purposes only and should not be construed as financial advice. Sneaker reselling involves inherent risks, and past performance is not indicative of future results. Errors and Omissions: Despite our best efforts, inadvertent errors or omissions may occur on the SneakerSpot website. We reserve the right to correct any such errors without prior notice. By using the SneakerSpot website, you acknowledge and accept these disclaimers. The SneakerSpot website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.privacy-policy: SneakerSpot Privacy Policy - Safeguarding Your Personal Information SneakerSpot HOME ABOUT US Products Contact SneakerSpot Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy outlines the manner in which SneakerSpot ("we," "us," or "our") gathers, utilizes, maintains, and discloses information collected from users (each, a "User") of the SneakerSpot website (the "Website"). Information We Collect We may collect various types of personal information from Users in connection with their use of the Website. This may include: Personally Identifiable Information (PII): This can encompass details like name, email address, postal address, phone number, and any other data that can directly identify a User. Non-Personally Identifiable Information (Non-PII): This refers to data that cannot be used to directly identify a User, such as demographic information (e.g., age, gender), browsing preferences, and technical information collected from the User's device (e.g., IP address, operating system, browser type). How We Utilize Information We may leverage the information we collect for a multitude of purposes, including: To personalize the User's experience: We may utilize Non-PII to tailor the Website's content and product offerings to better suit the User's interests. To improve the Website: We may use the information we gather to enhance the Website's functionality and user-friendliness. To process transactions: We may employ the information collected to process User transactions and deliver the products or services they purchase. To send promotional communications: With the User's consent, we may utilize their email address to send them promotional information or updates about SneakerSpot and its offerings. Data Disclosure We may disclose User information under certain circumstances, such as: To comply with legal obligations: We may disclose User information if compelled to do so by law, subpoena, or court order. To protect our rights: We may disclose User information if we believe it's necessary to protect our rights, property, or the safety of others. To third-party service providers: We may share User information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating the Website and delivering our services. However, these providers will only be granted access to the information necessary to perform their specific functions and will be obligated to maintain the confidentiality of the User information. Data Security We take reasonable precautions to safeguard User information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, it's crucial to remember that no security measures are foolproof, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of User information. Changes to this Privacy Policy We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We will post any changes on the Website and encourage Users to periodically review this policy to stay informed of updates. Your Consent By using the Website, you signify your consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the Website. The SneakerSpot website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: SneakerSpot Terms and Conditions - Guidelines for Using Our Services SneakerSpot HOME ABOUT US Products Contact SneakerSpot Terms and Conditions Welcome to SneakerSpot! These terms and conditions ("Terms") outline the rules and regulations governing your use of our website (the "Service") operated by SneakerSpot ("us," "we," or "our"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the Terms, you may not access the Service. 1. Account Terms You must be at least 13 years old to create an account on SneakerSpot. By creating an account, you represent and warrant that you are at least 13 years old and agree to be bound by these Terms. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify SneakerSpot immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other security breach. 2. Use of the Service The Service is for your personal, non-commercial use only. You may not modify, distribute, translate, reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble any portion of the Service. You agree not to use the Service for any unlawful purpose or in any way that violates these Terms. You agree not to: Upload or transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, obscene, hateful, or racially or ethnically offensive. Violate any intellectual property rights of others, including copyrights, trademarks, or patents. Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers or networks connected to the Service. Introduce any viruses, malware, or other harmful code into the Service. Impersonate any person or entity, or falsely state or otherwise misrepresent your affiliation with a person or entity. Crawl, scrape, or data mine the Service. 3. User Content You may contribute content to the Service, such as text, images, or videos ("User Content"). By contributing User Content, you grant SneakerSpot a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, reproduce, modify, publish, and distribute your User Content in connection with the Service. You retain all ownership rights to your User Content. However, you are responsible for ensuring that you have the rights to submit any User Content that you contribute to the Service. 4. Disclaimer THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. SNEAKERSPOT DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, ERROR-FREE, OR VIRUS-FREE. SNEAKERSPOT IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CONTENT OR DATA LOST THROUGH THE USE OF THE SERVICE. 5. Limitation of Liability IN NO EVENT SHALL SNEAKERSPOT, ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE OF THE SERVICE, EVEN IF SNEAKERSPOT HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.
